event.title: hosts a Blueberry Festival each June

data.event: Alma is known as Georgia's blueberry capital, and hosts a Blueberry Festival each June.
Alma was founded in 1900 as a stop on the Atlantic Coast Line Railroad.

event.title: was incorporated as a city in 1906

data.event: It was incorporated as a city in 1906 and designated seat of the newly formed Bacon County in 1914.
